Song.Title: Proud of You
Song.Lyrics:
Love in your eyes
Sitting silence by my side
Gong in holding hands
Walking throuth the night

Hold my up hold me tight
Lift me up to touch the sky
Teaching me to love with heart
Helping me open my mind

I can fly
I'm proud that I can fly
To give the best of mind
Till the end of the time
Belive my I can fly
I'm proud that I can fly
To give the best of mind
The heaven in the sky

Star in the sky
Wishing once upon the time
Give me love, Make me smile
Till the end of life

Hold my up hold me tight
Lift me up to touch the sky
Teaching me to love with heart
Helping me open my mind

I can fly
I'm proud that I can fly
To give the best of mind
Till the end of the time
Belive my I can fly
I'm proud that I can fly
To give the best of mind
The heaven in the sky

Can't you belive that you light up my way
No matter that ease my path
I'll never lose my faith

See me fly
I'm proud that I can fly
Show you the best of mine
Till the end of the time

Belive me I can fly
I'm singing in the sky
Show you the best of mine
The heaven of the sky

Nothing can stop my
Spread my wings so wide
